text: Seven 's ' Den ' all business .Oz reality skein to air this year .SYDNEY - Oz commercial terrestrial broadcaster Seven Network is producing a local version of hit Japanese reality skein " Dragon 's Den , " in which would - be entrepreneurs pitch an idea or invention to a panel of successful businessmen ." Dragon 's Den " was broadcast on Nippon Television and has been adapted by BBC2 in Blighty .The businessmen - known as dragons in Japan - decide how much money they want to invest in the ideas from their own pockets .
